class.name: HiLo
class.documentation: Maxima/minima may be plotted as text and/or as numerical values, default being symbols (H and L ). The user may, by calling the parameter setting routines, plot maxima/minima values in various colours, heights, qualities etc. Users have facilities for plotting only one of these values, i.e. local maxima or local minima.

parameter.name: contour_hilo_type
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter contour_hilo_type sent to new Magics[HiLo].

parameter.name: contour_hilo_window_size
parameter.documentation: Size of the window used to calculate the Hi/Lo
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter contour_hilo_window_size sent to new Magics[HiLo].
parameter.release_info: new Parameter : we envisage to have different methods to calculate Hi/Lo in future releases

parameter.name: contour_hilo_reduction_radius
parameter.documentation: Search radius (in grid points) for reducing the number of minima
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter contour_hilo_reduction_radius sent to new Magics[HiLo].

parameter.name: contour_hilo_suppress_radius
parameter.documentation: Radius of HiLo search in grid points (default value is for global cylindrical map)
parameter.migration: New Magics: Parameter contour_hilo_suppress_radius sent to new Magics[HiLo].

parameter.name: contour_hilo_max_value
parameter.documentation: Local HiLo above specified value are not drawn
